java/liquibase/database/sql/StoredProcedureStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 
00005 import java.sql.CallableStatement;
00006 import java.sql.SQLException;
00007 import java.util.ArrayList;
00008 import java.util.Collections;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 
00011 public class StoredProcedureStatement implements SqlStatement, CallableSqlStatement {
00012 
00013     private String procedureName;
00014     private List<String> parameters = new ArrayList<String>();
00015     private List<Integer> types = new ArrayList<Integer>();
00016 
00017 
00018     public StoredProcedureStatement(String procedureName) {
00019         this.procedureName = procedureName;
00020     }
00021 
00022     public String getProcedureName() {
00023         return procedureName;
00024     }
00025 
00026 
00027     public List<String> getParameters() {
00028         return Collections.unmodifiableList(parameters);
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void addParameter(String param, int type) {
00032         parameters.add(param);
00033         types.add(type);
00034     }
00035 
00036     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00037         return true;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) {
00041         StringBuffer string = new StringBuffer();
00042         string.append("exec (").append(procedureName);
00043         for (String param : getParameters()) {
00044             string.append(" ").append(param).append(",");
00045         }
00046         return string.toString().replaceFirst(",$", ")");
00047     }
00048 
00049 
00050     public CallableStatement createCallableStatement(Database database) throws SQLException {
00051         StringBuffer sql = new StringBuffer("{call " + getProcedureName());
00052 
00053         if (parameters.size() > 0) {
00054             sql.append("(");
00055             //noinspection UnusedDeclaration
00056             for (Object param : parameters) {
00057                 sql.append("?,");
00058             }
00059             sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(","));
00060             sql.append(")");
00061         }
00062 
00063         sql.append("}");
00064 
00065         CallableStatement pstmt = database.getConnection().prepareCall(sql.toString());
00066 
00067         for (int i = 0; i < parameters.size(); i++) {
00068             Object param = parameters.get(i);
00069             int type = database.getDatabaseType(types.get(i));
00070 
00071             if (param == null) {
00072                 pstmt.setNull(i + 1, type);
00073             } else {
00074                 pstmt.setObject(i + 1, param, type);
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         return pstmt;
00079     }
00080 
00081 
00082     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00083         return ";";
00084     }
00085 }
